mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS missionId, m.title AS title, p.nickname AS childName, m.type AS missionType, m.start_date AS startDate, m.end_date AS endDate, m.status AS missionStatus FROM mission m JOIN profile p ON m.child_profile_id = p.id WHERE m.parents_profile_id = #{profileId} AND m.child_profile_id = #{childProfileId} ORDER BY m.id desc
